<h3 id="X30282">X(30282) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-ASCELLA AND TRINH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(5*a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(30282) = 2*X(942)-5*X(17603) = 4*X(942)-5*X(30274) = (r+2R)*X(1) + 4r*X(3)
</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11410). X(30282) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30282) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {2,3586}, {7,10304}, {9,5440}, {10,4305}, {20,5226}, {21,936}, {30,5219}, {33,7501}, {63,17549}, {72,19535}, {78,3219}, {80,6174}, {100,9623}, {103,15730}, {140,9581}, {142,25055}, {200,993}, <p>
X(30282) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 13384), (30274, 17603)<br>
X(30282) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3, 15803), (1, 484, 18421), (1, 7280, 3361), (484, 18421, 2093)<br>
</p>
